Sonic Sex Panic - Something Like That demo 1994
Sonic Sex Panic - Something Like That demo 1994

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 29, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Energetic, catchy as hell São Paulo punk circe 1994. I got nothing to say (I know, weird, right?) because I have no connection to the tape - but the tunes are there and this tape is a blast. Treat yourself here instead of church. Trust me. Choice creamer: the one riff anthem "Skater's Head." SOMETHING LIKE THAT
